Privacy policy Your privacy is the most important thing for me, Ayoze Pérez Rodríguez, and for that reason I want to explain you clearly what data the app require of the user, why the app do that and how the app and I use this data.
1.WHO I AM Ayoze Pérez Rodríguez(hereafter "THE DEVELOPER") with address Teichgraben, 4, Jena, Germany, with National Id 42217341J. Telephone number 01590 3510907, with website ayoprez.com, and email address arezrod@gmail.com
2.WHAT DATA THE APP COLLECTS DeilyLang(hereafter "SOFTWARE PRODUCT") collects from the user two data that helps to recognize each user. When the user sign in through a social network sign in button, and give the necessary permissions, the app takes the social network id from the user. The other data it takes is from which social networks come this id. This information is encrypted and saved in the app’s database. At this way anybody can know exactly who is sign in, and I don’t save any kind of personal data, just a number, that is all what the app needs. The app require as well the user name, but this is not saved anywhere, and is just show it as a design requirement.
3.WHY THE APP COLLECTS THIS DATA The app uses all the data collected in SOFTWARE PRODUCT with the purpose of identify each user and allow them to save content. In the example of DeilyLang, the user can save the words he/she already knows, and see all the words he/she knows.
4.ARE THIS DATA DISCLOSED TO THIRD PARTIES? THE DEVELOPER counts with a server provided by 1and1 Internet SE with address in Elgendorfer Str. 57, Montabaur, and with the terms and conditions, data and privacy policy indicated in the links below:
